title: Growing Global Tensions - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/12/17
itunes:title: Growing Global Tensions - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/12/17
description:
George Noory and guests Jerome Corsi and Howard Bloom discuss the increasingly strained relationships between the United States, Russia, Syria and North Korea, and whether it could lead to a new World War.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
